title: Opening Ceremonies
description: kick off the con with the anons at marecon HQ! Hear what we have in store for marecon 2026, with some sneak peeks at some panels, our vendors, and more!

title: I Hope My Dog Doesn't Bark During The Panel
description: Two friends drawing doodles and singing songs for an hour \^c^/

title: Lesson Zero [Anatomically Correct Version]
description: oco

title: PonePuzzle Time
description:
Join other anons to solve cute mare puzzles while comfy pone music plays in the background!
Or you can sit back and relax watching other anons work like zebras while you jam to horsey tunes!

title: Poni Kamp
description: Are you interested in camping innawoods?

title: CYOA Live! Anonfilly's Battle of Love
description:
Another rousing game of CYOA Live! In this quest, Hearts and Hooves day is just around the corner and of course, Anonfilly hasn't found a special somepony. Clearly the only solution is to fix this. As you begin your Ponyville morning, (You) must battle both the democracy of the polls and the dice to find a solution to your dilemma. Will (You) find a filly-free pony? Will (You) become a terrorist of the heart, removing the holiday from Equestrian Calendars? Or, will (You) just decide to pursue wizard-hood, and fuck, I don't know, kill Spike again and usurp Celestia's throne?
As usual, during this CYOA panel, anything goes so long as luck and the people are on your side, from thermo-nuclear fission to abandoning the quest for loftier goals, the game doesn't end until we run out of time. Each scene will be hand-doodled by me after each vote and roll during a short "loading" section. If you've never participated in one of these, here's a link to the previous CYOA Live! so you can begin cooking your evil, awful schemes to make this run into another masterpiece: https://pony.tube/w/t7Wtodz3evrbNe2v65oGSy

title: Mare Music LIVE!
description: some musicfags get together and make some mare music live

title: Writing a letter to Hasbro
description: Want to tell Hasbro how much you love the direction they've taken MLP? Type a word in the stream chat and I'll write* it down, then send it to Hasbro's corporate address at 1027 Newport Avenue, Pawtucket, RI 02862!

title: Pony Music and (the) Audacity
description:
Examining pony music in Audacity because while on one hoof, it's fucking awesome that pony music is basically a huge DIY scene centered around a colorful horse show, on the other hoof, not everyone always gets the final bits quite right aka haha funny red bars go clip. Just a shitpost panel really, although I will be showing and talking about some regular music to show how mastering can be done right, has been done wrong, and how pony music fares. I'll have a number of pony songs picked out of course, but feel free to bring some yourself to look at together.
And then I dunno afterwards we can explore and find cool pony music on Bandcamp, because I feel like that'd be comfy.

title: Drawing with Darkdoomer
description: As promised last year, I'm going to do it again, only just pencils and paper, and you tell me what to draw !

title: How To Make A MARE-sical!
description: Take a look behind the scenes at how PTS - The MARE-sical! was produced. A short presentation followed by open discussion + Q&A.

title: Random Mare Appreciation: Appreciate Harder
description: We are back with more cute mares! For those who don't know, we pick mares at random and appreciate them. Drawfags are welcome to come and make pictures!

title: Interview with D'lirium developers
description: Did you know that mares can be scary? In this panel we'll talk with the developers of D'lirium, a pony horror and 2d shooter inspired by the classics from the 90s, where cute amres face spooky monsters and interdimensional shenanigans. Game steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/670160/DLIRIUM

title: That Artist is a Spy!
description: Its the usual mare draw panel, but every mare draw is done in a different artist's art style! Can the artist disguise each draw as the chosen art style? Watch and find out!

title: Backwards Through The Mirror Review
description: I will have a powerpoint slide ready depicting events from this undervalued now archived fimfiction story . I would just talk about the events of the story, from Twilight's return from the hedge to where I last read off.

title: Come To NeighCon
description: Staff for NeighCon explain why you should make it to our awesome convention.

title: The Newlywed Game!
description: Just how well do (You) know your waifu? Well enough to creatively answer questions about her and your lives together? Confident enough to do it live and for those answers to go head to head with that other fag in the chat who thinks he's better? Give the best answers to earn points for your mare team and your waifu's honour!

title: DRAWING: The Drinking Game
description: It's not just "I drawing and drink." This is an art stream for survival. You are the main character who fights against three opponents: random, audience, own mistakes. The atmosphere relaxed, like at a kitchen get-together with friends, where everyone laughs over one poor guy (you). I'm creating a design document for this, which describes how to choose a theme for drawing, as well as under what conditions I drink, but it's still in Russian. I'll do it in English later when it's done.

title: Birthday Party With Anons \o/
description: Four of us anons will be celebrating one of our birthdays! Cake, Alcohol, Cigars, and why each of our favorite ponies is best pony, proportionally schizo to the amount of alcohol consumed.

title: Drawing ponies on paper
description: Traditional art session taking some basic request from the chat. Not pro level, for reference look out for artist:zenco on Derpibooru or zncoArt in Xitter

title: Horsewords & (You): (You)rself
description:
Let's revisit a past topic with fresh eyes: characters . What makes them tick? What makes them great? Why are they so petty?
With this we will better understand our mares and how to write for them. Because they don't have fingers.

title: I Don't Know What This Is
description: it's a mystery

title: Mare Doom
description: Short Doom machinima -if i can deliver- and then long-ish DooM Game session. Opening animation->DM->3 or 2-way CTF->Invasion or cooperative. Yeah i think this should be good.

title: I wonder if my pony can fly?
description: My wonderful pegasus pony has never truly been able to take wing and do what she does best. I'm going to use the power of pony inflation to try and fix that.

title: Marecon Jackbox!
description: Come play Jackbox with fellow Anons from /mlp/! We'll be playing games from Party Packs 3-10 , including Quiplash, Trivia Murder Party, Survive the Internet, and more!

title: Russian Fanfiction Overview 2
description: It's a widely known fact that MARES make everything better, and fiction is no exception. Tune in to hear about the best and the worst examples of russian fanfiction about our favorite technicolor equines. Sad fics, funny fics, thoughtful fics, and trashfics - this panel has it all. Linky will be there!

title: Applejack Appreciation Appointment
description: A selection of some episodes and fanmade content featuring the prettiest, loyalest, most dependable, strongest, most fashionable, most marriageable, most motherly, and downright silliest pony in Equestria, curated by the anons on /aj/
